00023 class Frame

00040 double Nx() const {return xMax-xMin+1;}
00042 double Ny() const {return yMax-yMin+1;}
00044 Point Center() const {return Point((xMax+xMin)*0.5,(yMax+yMin)*0.5);}

00071   bool operator !=(const Frame &Right) const {return !(*this == Right);}
